alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 23 at 9:03AM EDT until March 24 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM EDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of a tenth to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Delaware and Sullivan counties. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 11 AM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain will be fairly spotty across lower elevations of Delaware and Sullivan Counties. Higher elevations in eastern Delaware County, and central to northern Sullivan County, are the most likely to have ice with temperatures dipping below freezing.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
